text: Matthew Robinson (21 April 1907 – August 1987) was an English footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Felling, County Durham. He played for Cardiff City, Chester, and Manchester United. ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1907 births Category:1987 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Cardiff City F.C. players Category:Chester City F.C. players Category:Date of death missing Category:People from County Durham (before 1974) Category:Association football forwards
title: Matt Robinson (footballer, born 1907)
